QuestData.Title: Valley of Sorrows
QuestData.Description:
Your friend's memories are gone.
Dat is Akunda's gift to us. He takes away our painful memories, but a lot more than dat has gone missing lately.
I can't even remember what I had for breakfast, and it's getting worse by de day.
Something's not right.
Meijani and I had a plan. We were going to do... something... in de Valley of Sorrows. It's where Akunda keeps de forgotten memories.
If you're looking for answers, finding Meijani is de best place to start.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Meijani in the Valley of Sorrows.
